b:widget.title: Laxer OS : Arch based Linux distribution (Header)

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Laxer OS is an Arch Linux-based distribution of Linux from PAKISTAN for work and everyday use. Our OS is available for any 64-bit computer, laptop, or tablet. Our distribution focuses on security, reliability, and performance, You will notice the significant performance boost on the first boot of your system, we are determined to provide you a platform to Get Things Done.
A beautifully crafted GNU/Linux operating system based on Arch Linux Rolling Release model from Pakistan.
Laxer OS is based on Arch Linux and provides you rolling release model and all benefits of thousands of cutting-edge/bleeding-edge software.
We ship all essentials apps for day to day use and give you access to Arch Linux packages and AUR with a powerful software manager Pamac.
Laxer OS ships with a Gnome desktop which is stable, easy to use, very customizable and elegant way to use your computer or touch tablets.
Laxer OS is made possible by below developers / team.
Project Lead Developer of Laxer OS from Pakistan.
Co-Developer of Laxer OS from Poland

div.p: Here You Will Find The Answers Of Your Most Asked Questions
Laxer OS is an Arch Linux-based distribution of Linux from PAKISTAN for work and everyday use. Our OS is available for any 64-bit computer, laptop, or tablet.

Laxer OS is a versatile, and simple Linux distribution designed to fit the needs of the competent and common Linux users. It is powerful, easy to manage and install, making it an ideal distribution for computer laptops workstations and tablets.

h3.span: 3. What graphical environment does Laxer OS use?

div.p: We ship it with a Gnome desktop environment that is efficient, stable, easy to use, and very customizable.

h3.span: 4. What is the price of Laxer OS ?

div.p: It's totally free ! we do not charge any thing from our users for downloading, sharing and using Laxer OS.

h3.span: 5. What are the Laxer OS hardware requirements?

div.p: Just only 1GB RAM, 1GHz processor and minimum 10GB space on hard drive.

h3.span: 6. Where do I find help if I encounter any problem?

div.p: Our team answer and resolve any requested ticked. Just use „Contact us” on our webpage.

Laxer OS is one of the most secure Operating Systems out there if not completely secure. Forget about paying for antivirus software that you had to install in Windows. Although viruses for Linux do exist but they’re too few in number to matter. Most viruses written for windows can’t even run in Linux. One of the reasons for this is because most viruses are targeted for Windows as it runs on the majority of desktops.
We give you access to Arch Linux packages and AUR with a powerful software manager Pamac.

h3.span: 9. How many bits has Laxer OS ?

div.p: 64-bit - It is faster under most circumstances and as an added bonus also inherently more secure due to the nature of Address space layout randomization (ASLR) in combination with Position-independent code (PIC) and the NX Bit which is not available in the stock i686 kernel due to disabled PAE.
Use „Rufus” to save downloaded image of Laxer OS on stick-USB. Boot your computer from USB and wait for GUI installer.

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: You can also find us on below social media platforms.
